attributes.action: give us a referendum on the EU’s Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown your government and your party promised the British people of this once great nation to a referendum on EU's Lisbon Treaty. The village of East Stoke in Dorset has sent a clear message to you and your government which it feels reflects the mood of the entire country - give us a referendum on the EU’s Lisbon Treaty now, like you promised!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
